import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { locations } from '../../data/locations'; import edit from '../../images/edit.png'; import "./EmploiDetails.css"; const EmploiDetail = ({ emploi }) => { const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); const [showEmail, setShowEmail] = useState(false); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [visibility, setIsVisible] = useState(emploi.visibility || false); const [editedEmploi, setEditedEmploi] = useState({ ...emploi }); const toggleDetails = () => setShowDetails(prev => !prev); const toggleEmail = () => setShowEmail(prev => !prev); const toggleEdit = () => setIsEditing(prev => !prev); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setEditedEmploi(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (

    {emploi.nom_poste}

    Entreprise: {emploi.nom_entreprise} Emplacement: {emploi.emplacement} Salaire: {emploi.salaire} Catégorie: {emploi.categorie} {showEmail && (
    ×

    Email: {emploi.email_employeur}

    )} {showDetails && (
    ×

    Description:

    {emploi.description}

    Responsabilités:

    {emploi.responsabilite}

    Exigences:

    {emploi.exigence}

    )} {isEditing && (
    ×

    Modifier l'offre d'emploi
